Issue.creator: mgbailey
Issue.summary: Unrecognized role should generate an error when adding a NYM
Issue.description: In attempting to add a TRUST_ANCHOR NYM to the ledger, it appears that this role was (incorrectly) not recognized. The NYM was added to the ledger, with no role assigned. If a role is not recognized, the proper behavior should be to reject the transaction, and to generate an error.
